titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that The MacDowell Colony in Peterborough, New Hampshire, should be recognized for its contribution to the arts around the world, and the cultural heritage of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 10/15/2009--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House Representatives that The MacDowell Colony in Peterborough, New Hampshire, should be recognized for its contribution to the arts around the world and the cultural heritage of the United States.
